message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $110. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $110 feels a bit high for me. Would you consider $85?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  To be honest, $90 is the highest I can go.  What do you say?
